About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a Full Stack Web Developer, Certified Scrum Master, and a foreign medical doctor. Five years ago I and my family moved to the USA, just after I finished my internship and started to practice. When we came to a new country, I was fascinated with the possibilities that the tech industry offers here. When medicine and technology bind together, they can create something unbelievable.

The same impulse that led me into the medical field in my earlier career has led me to IT: the moment of discovery when pieces of a puzzle fall together, excitement when you found a good solution. I am investigative, driven to make a difference, motivated to work as part of a team to diagnose and solve complex problems. I am experienced in highly detailed work with no room for error and can communicate complex information to team members and clients.
